title: Knife Blade, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Steel blade, parallel sides with rounded ends. Plain bolster, threaded projection attached to bolster.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife Blade, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. brass, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-261-a.
